```{r}
rm(list=ls())
setwd("~/Downloads/cdc2020")
hl2018 <- read.csv("house_loans_2018.csv")
fip <- read.csv("fips.csv")
```

```{r}
countynames <- data.frame(names = fip$County, codes = fip$FIPS.code + 37000)

hl2018_bycounty <- hl2018 %>% filter(action_taken == 2 | action_taken == 3 | action_taken == 6) %>% group_by(county_code)

hl2018_loanaccprop <- hl2018_bycounty %>% summarise(prop_approval = mean(action_taken == 2 | action_taken == 6))


```
